description: Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) is an introspective self-report questionnaire indicating differing psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions.

An intelligence quotient (IQ) is a total score derived from a set of standardized tests designed to assess human intelligence. The abbreviation 'IQ' was coined by the William Stern for the German term Intelligenzquotient.

The Rorschach test is a psychological test in which 'subjects' perceptions of inkblots are recorded and then analyzed using psychological interpretation. Some psychologists use this test to examine a person's personality.

C++, being a statically typed programming language is very powerful and Fast.
it's DMA feature makes it more useful. !

Linux is a OPEN SOURCE Operating System which powers many Servers and Workstation.
